Verses: 1 nee Rubavadhi, En Piriyame! Nee Rubavadhi; Un Mukkaattin Naduve Un Kangal Puraakkangalaayirukkiradhu; Un Koondhal Keeleyaadh Malaiyil Thazhaimeyum Vellaattu Mandhaiyaippolirukkiradhu.
2 un Parkal, Mayir Kaththarikkappattapin Kulippaattappattuk Karaiyerugiravaigalum, Ondraagilum Maladaayiraamal Ellaam Rattaikkuttiyeendravaigalumaana Aattumandhaiyaippolirukkiradhu.
3 un Udhadugal Sivappunoolukku Samaanamum, Un Vaakku Inbamumaayirukkiradhu; Un Mukkaattin Naduve Un Kannangal Vediththa Maadhalam Pazhampolirukkiradhu.
4 un Kazhuththu, Paraakkiramasaaligalin Kedagangalaagiya Aayiram Parisaigal Thookkiyirukkira Aayudhasaalaiyaakkappatta Dhaaveedhin Koburampolirukkiradhu.
5 un Irandu Sthanangalum Leelipushpangalil Meyum Rattaikkuttigalukku Samaanam.
6 pagal Kulirchchiyaagi Nizhal Saaindhupogumvaraikkum, Naan Vellaippolamalaiyilum Saambiraanimalaiyilum Poyiruppen.
7 en Piriyame! Nee Poorana Roobavadhi; Unnil Pazhudhondrumillai.

8 leebanonilirundhu Ennode Vaa, En Manavaaliye! Leebanonilirundhu Ennode Vaa. Amanaavin Kodumudiyilirundhum, Seneer Ermonin Kodumudiyilirundhum, Singangalin Thaabarangalilirundhum, Sivingigalin Malaigalilirundhum Keezhe Paar.
9 en Irudhayaththaik Kavarndhukondaai; En Sagodhariye! En Manavaaliye! Un Kangalilondrinaalum Un Kazhuththilulla Oru Sarappaniyinaalum En Irudhayaththaik Kavarndhukondaai.

10 un Nesam Evvalavu Inbamaayirukkiradhu; En Sagodhariye! En Manavaaliye! Dhraatcharasaththaippaarkkilum Un Nesam Evvalavu Madhuramaayirukkiradhu! Sagala Kandhavarkkangalaippaarkkilum Un Parimalathailangal Evvalavu Vaasanaiyaayirukkiradhu!
11 en Manavaaliye! Un Udhadugalilirundhu Then Ozhugugiradhu, Un Naavin Keezh Thenum Paalum Irukkiradhu, Un Vasthirangalin Vaasanai Leebanonin Vaasanaikkoppaayirukkiradhu.
12 en Sagodhariye! En Manavaaliye! Nee Adaikkappatta Thottamum, Maraivu Kattappatta Neerootrum, Muththirikkappatta Kinarumaayirukkiraai.
13 un Thottam Maadhalanchedigalum, Arumaiyaana Kanimarangalum, Marudhondri Sedigalum, Naladhachchedigalum,

14 naladhamum, Kungumamum, Vasambum, Lavangamum, Sagalavidha Thoobavarkka Marangalum, Vellaippolachchedigalum, Sandhana Virutchangalum, Sagalavidha Kandhavarkkachchedigalumulla Singaaravanamaayirukkiradhu.
15 thottangalukku Neerootrum, Jeevaththanneerin Thuravum, Leebanonilirundhu Odivarum Vaaikkaalgalum Undaayirukkiradhu.
16 vaadaiye! Ezhumbu; Thendrale! Vaa; Kandhappisingal Vadiya En Thottaththil Veesu; En Nesar Thammudaiya Thottaththukku Vandhu, Thamadhu Arumaiyaana Kanigalaip Pusippaaraaga.
